answers.answer: You should contact your vet and let them know about this change in activity level.  If she has just started taking the insulin, then it could be that her dosage needs to be adjusted.  Only your vet is qualified to determine whether or not this change is significant or needs to be addressed medically.Ghilly

question: Just found out my dog had diabetes, she is a small dog about 8 lbs.  She seemed much more active till I started her on the insulin.  Is that normal in the beginning?Thank you,
title: Dog with diabetes
